sourcesContent:
import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' import SelectItem from '../../util/SelectItem' import '../../styles/chart.css' import AreaChartSmall from './AreaChartSmall' import apiCall from '../../util/apiCall'; export default class Summary extends Component { state = { tickerQuote: null, tickerToLook: null, // selfTicker: null } getQuote (symbol) { if(symbol) { const endpoint = `/api/list/${symbol}/quote` const promise = apiCall(endpoint,'get') promise.then(blob => blob.json()).then (json=> { this.setState({ tickerQuote: json.quote }) }) }} pickHandle = (symbol) => { this.setState({ selfTicker: symbol }) } componentDidMount(){ if(this.props.match.params.symbol) { this.setState({tickerToLook:this.props.match.params.symbol}) this.getQuote(this.props.match.params.symbol) } } render() { let previousClose,open,low,high,week52Low,week52High,latestVolume,avgTotalVolume,previousVolume, marketCap,peRatio,change,changePercent,ytdChange if(this.state.tickerQuote){ const { previousClose, open, low, high, week52Low, week52High, latestVolume, avgTotalVolume, previousVolume, marketCap, peRatio, change, changePercent, ytdChange } = this.state.quote } return (
Previous close
{previousClose}
Open
{open}
Day's Range
{low} - {high}
52 Week Range
{week52Low} - {week52High}
Volume
{latestVolume}
Avg. Volume
{avgTotalVolume}
Previous Volume
{previousVolume}
Market Cap
{marketCap}
PE Ratio (TTM)
{peRatio}
Change
{change}
Change Percent
{changePercent}
Year to Date change
{ytdChange}
) } }
